adverbs.description: ruminatingly (comparative more ruminatingly, superlative most ruminatingly)

entries.meaning: While ruminating; with thought or meditation.
examples: "And it always seems to me," he went on ruminatingly, "that, after all we are nothing better than interlopers on the earth, disfiguring and staining wherever we go. I know it's shocking blasphemy to say so, but then it's different here, you see. We are further away."
